choices.D: Under Core Infrastructure then Autonomous Exadata
choices.C: Under Solutions and Platform then Platform Services then Autonomous Exadata
choices.A: Under Core Infrastructure then Compute then Autonomous Exadata
choices.B: Under Database then Autonomous Transaction Processing then Autonomous Exadata

questions.question_text:
When working with an Autonomous Exadata Infrastructure supporting Autonomous Databases, where do you go to view the maintenance history of the Exadata?
(Choose the best answer.)

discussion.content: B appears most accurate. https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/Content/Database/Tasks/adbmanaginginfrastructure.htm#viewmaintenancehistory. Even though the UI has changed recently, this documentation has the user go to Menu -> Database

What pre-defined database services are available with ADB?

ADB comes with 5 preconfigured database services, HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW, TP and TPURGENT. The services control the priority of the sessions when the system is under resource pressure and some control the parallel degree used. By default, queries will execute serially when connected to the TP, TPURGENT and LOW services.

Users can specify a parallel degree on an object or uses optimizer hints to trigger parallel execution to be used when connected to the TP and TPURGENT services. Queries will be automatically executed in parallel when sessions are connected to the HIGH and MEDIUM services.

https://www.oracle.com/database/technologies/datawarehouse-bigdata/adb-faqs.html
Yes, answer is D. TPURGENT has MANUAL parallelism, while TP has 1 parallelism, that is no parallelism at all

questions.question_text:
You have a requirement to create an Autonomous Transaction Processing database that can support at least 200 concurrent statements per OCPU as well as parallelism.
Which service will you need to connect to? (Choose the best answer.)
For Fleet admins to access dedicated Exadata infrastructure, which policy should be assigned? (Choose the best answer.)

choices.D: Allow group ADB-Admins to manage autonomous-database in tenancy where target.workloadType = 'OLTP'
choices.A: Allow group ADB-Admins to manage autonomous-database-family in tenancy.
choices.C: Allow group ADB-Admins to manage autonomous-database in tenancy.
choices.B: Allow group ADB-Admins to manage autonomous-database in tenancy where target.workloadType = 'DW'

discussion.content: The correct answer should be A.

questions.question_text: The Oracle Autonomous Database dedicated Exadata infrastructure feature is based upon which Oracle Cloud resources? (Choose the best answer.)

choices.C: Fleet Administrator, Database Administrator, Database User, Autonomous Exadata Infrastructure
choices.D: Virtual Cloud Network, Compartments, Policies, Autonomous Exadata Infrastructure
choices.A: Oracle Machine Learning Zeppelin Notebook, Autonomous Exadata Infrastructure, Fleet Administrator, Database Administrator
choices.B: Autonomous Exadata Infrastructure, Autonomous Backup, Autonomous Container Database, Autonomous Database

discussion.content: To determine where the Autonomous Database is created on the Dedicated infrastructure, the Database Administrator needs to select D) the Compartment of the Dedicated infrastructure 1. This is because each compartment only runs one Dedicated environment, and selecting the correct compartment ensures that the Autonomous Database is created in the correct environment

Selected Answer: A
A
Select or enter basic information for your new dedicated database:
Compartment: Select a compartment from the list of available compartments

https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/autonomous-database/doc/create-adb.html

comments.content: Nevermind, I missed the second half of that answer

choices.D: the name or OCID of the Exadata infrastructure which was assigned by the Fleet Administrator
choices.E: the Listener endpoint where the Autonomous Database should register on
choices.C: the Client Credentials wallet which is used to connect to the Autonomous Database
choices.A: the Compartment of the Dedicated infrastructure as each compartment only runs 1 Dedicated environment
choices.B: the 'High Availability Container Database' in which the Autonomous instance should run
